theory.introduction: Welcome to Python! You're about to write your first program - the famous 'Hello, World!' This is a tradition that every programmer follows when learning a new language.
theory.explanation: Python is a powerful yet beginner-friendly programming language. It's used by companies like Google, Netflix, and Instagram. The print() function is your first tool - it displays text on the screen.
keyPoints: The print() function displays text to the console
Text (strings) must be enclosed in quotes
You can use single ' or double " quotes

codeExamples.explanation: This displays 'Hello, World!' on the screen
Double quotes work the same as single quotes

task.objective: Write a Python program that prints 'Hello, World!' to the console
task.description: This is the traditional first program that every programmer writes. It teaches you the basic syntax of Python and how to produce output.
